Reviews.Content: chose night stay close rome termini arrived evening departed morning yes perfect stylish impressive hotel impression fitout hotel apartment building hotel 2 streets left termini front entrance look mcdonalds via left easy pull luggage night lots hotels street safe reception staff extremely pleasant helpful spoke english modern elevator servicing floors 5th mechanics elevator cavity cage 6th floor space unavoidable care respect original building conversion hotel appreciated 602 elevator 5th floor carried suitcases stairs worth effort 602 accesses terrazza running width hotel frontage requested balcony terrazza delighted 602 enjoyed pleasant rome evening rooftop views outside happily ourselves bliss bedroom attractive modern fitout tiled bathroom jet bath wall hairdryer air conditioning mini frig free wifi bed extremely comfortable cleanliness hotel impeccable looked brand breakfast beautifully decorated sparkling layout food available excellent staff efficient dinner restaurant street parallel hotel locals husband found heaven favourite pasta tortellini alla crema menu serving vat sized giveaway italian servings tortellini pasta cooked tasted raw cheap anyway eating suggest hotel staff recommendations visits rome hadnt considered termini salubrious visit tourism purposes changed minds popular suspect wonderful hotel spot excellent value money hub planning travel train locations close outside rome metro termini advantageous rome

Reviews.Title: “Good and bad accommodations.”
Reviews.Author: Sallie F
Reviews.Content: night quaint didnt expect american standards met clean nite apartment hotel reservation cancelled knowledge apartment size wires hazardous children tub chipped stained maybe dirty kitchen equipped couldnt refrigerator kicker pay apartment dump beds hotel apartment sleeping floor plus food breakfast location fantastic close termini

Reviews.Title: “Contilia, Contilia”
Reviews.Author: yoyocu
Reviews.Content: stayed 18th 20th hotel reports read pictures seen etc beautiful property gorgeous polished marble floors outside imagine hotel looks inside clean bright elegant bathrooms modern elegant hotel shape breakfast excellent continental breakfast elegant dining hotel staff personalized treatment makes feel home rome

Reviews.Title: “This hotel can ruin your trip to Rome.”
Reviews.Author: Amanda_and_Tyler
Reviews.Content: dont stay tempted price 1the bed hard woke pain morning thats fall asleep night dirty sheets gross bathroom tiny gross ew pick included breakfast wasting money breakfast disgusting hard rolls cheese meat stale croissants walked miles everyday sketchy bottom line rome vacation looking holiday dont stay coming hostels transit close train station crash maybe consider

Reviews.Title: “not as advertised”
Reviews.Author: sp27toronto
Reviews.Content: booked hotel expediaca advertised 3star 220 night arrived told staying apartment street escorted doors seedy apartment housed pensione 1star hotel concierge hotel insisted moved main hotel told available try morning called american express placed dispute based misrepresentation decided checkout morning didnt choice walls paper thin heard guy throwing night baby crying couple kitchen chairs dragged floor bed morning hotel thank god reviews tripadvisor bang clean thats washroom substandard 3star stairways hallways dingy breakfast buns ham cheese jam powdered juice coffee ate stayed rome 5 times 4 3star status none former hotels availability cleanliness front desk staff concerned attentive thank focus downtown core hike overpriced offered discount staying apartment paid hotel rate sneaky

Reviews.Title: “3 Night Stay”
Reviews.Author: medlhuber
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights biggest benefit opinion 23 blocks termini station arrived via train left via train fco airport metro rome time youre familiar subway rome 2 major lines cross termini ease location neighborhood isnt worst eat nearby hotel staff spoke english able establishments free breakfast included free wifi lobby huge tiny hotel paris nice decor enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Was ok for 1 night...”
Reviews.Author: trinity1981
Reviews.Content: didnt book rome advance happy weekend wasnt hot aircon hk wake obviously clean 2 hours till check time breakfast embarrassed probably late people holiday dont wanna rush checking space store luggage told leave floor front reception safe solution

Reviews.Title: “great hotel with great location”
Reviews.Author: Rana2008
Reviews.Content: returned rome husband celebrating anniversary booked guest house arrived comfortable walk beside found hotel hotel location pics shocked 108 nice recently renovated bathroom clean staff helpful despite cost guest free wifi recommend rome

Reviews.Title: “couldn't wait to go home!!”
Reviews.Author: leighc19
Reviews.Content: kept clean day thats books information mini bar cans coke costing 3 euro times breakfast starts breakfast bread jam thats pretty unlucky facing hotel prepaired 4 cats living below scream 247 location wasnt poorest rome metro 2 min walk escape 2 days eventually found pubs near night staff completly unhelpful information leave showers actually laugh am aware hotel cheap shouldnt expected opinion pay little extra stay else wish
